import pandas as pd

np.random.seed(0)
y = np.random.rand(100)
ys = pd.Series(y)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

expanding_mean[source]

expanding_mean(x:ndarray)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert np.allclose(expanding_mean(y), ys.expanding().mean().values)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

expanding_std[source]

expanding_std(x:ndarray)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert np.allclose(expanding_std(y), ys.expanding().std().values, equal_nan=True)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

expanding_max[source]

expanding_max(x:ndarray)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert np.allclose(expanding_max(y), ys.expanding().max().values)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

expanding_min[source]

expanding_min(x:ndarray)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert np.allclose(expanding_min(y), ys.expanding().min().values)
{% endraw %}

Seasonal

{% raw %} 
y_df = ys.to_frame('y')
y_df['season'] = np.arange(7)[[i % 7 for i in range(y.size)]]
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

seasonal_expanding_mean[source]

seasonal_expanding_mean(x:ndarray, season_length:int)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert np.allclose(y_df.groupby('season')['y'].transform(lambda y: y.expanding().mean()).values,
                   seasonal_expanding_mean(y, 7))
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

seasonal_expanding_std[source]

seasonal_expanding_std(x:ndarray, season_length:int)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert np.allclose(y_df.groupby('season')['y'].transform(lambda y: y.expanding().std()).values,
                   seasonal_expanding_std(y, 7),
                   equal_nan=True)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

seasonal_expanding_min[source]

seasonal_expanding_min(x:ndarray, season_length:int)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert np.allclose(y_df.groupby('season')['y'].transform(lambda y: y.expanding().min()).values,
                   seasonal_expanding_min(y, 7))
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

seasonal_expanding_max[source]

seasonal_expanding_max(x:ndarray, season_length:int)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert np.allclose(y_df.groupby('season')['y'].transform(lambda y: y.expanding().max()).values,
                   seasonal_expanding_max(y, 7))
{% endraw %}
